Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • MainMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MainMenu
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A class that displays the main menu. It has 3 screens to display: options to create a new simulation, an explanation of the Puella Magi universe, and credits.
    Author:
    Sally Hui, Jiayin Huang, Tony Cui
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  MainMenu.FileNameButton
      The class that provides custom buttons for the file names.
      (package private) class  MainMenu.MainJPanel
      A class to draw the background onto the JPanel for the JContentPane of the main menu.
      (package private) class  MainMenu.WorldGeneratorOptions
      A class that allows the user to configure the world generator object used to generate new spacetime and viewport objects.

        public void configSave(MainMenu.WorldGeneratorOptions options)
        Saves the configurations set in the specified WorldGeneratorOptions object to PuellaMagi.cfg.
        Parameters:
        options - the object to serialize

      • configLoad

        public MainMenu.WorldGeneratorOptions configLoad()
        Attempts to load the configuration settings from last time. If the deserialization is unsuccessful, it just creates a new WorldGeneratorOptions instance.
        Returns:
        the deserialized object

      • deserialize

        public void deserialize()
        Deserializes the selected save file. That is, loads/unpacks it. Files to be deserialized by this method are serialized by the serialize method in the SimulationScreen class.

      • startOptions

        public void startOptions()
        Displays the screen to start a new simulation or load an existing one.

      • setMainText

        public void setMainText(java.lang.String textString)
        For use with the introduction or credits screens. Sets the text in the JScrollPane.
        Parameters:
        textString - the text to be added to the JScrollPane
